General.Name: Beijing Xinleineng Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Relpow Technology Co., Ltd manufactures and sells power supply products in China and internationally. The company primarily offers DC-DC module power supply, AC-DC module power supply, POE power supply, embedded power system, AC-DC and DC-DC server power supply, communication rectifier, and micropower supplies. It serves communication and network, rail transit power supply, industrial power, security power, aviation, aerospace, vehicles, ships, and special power supplies fields. The company was formerly known as Beijing Xinleineng Technology Co., Ltd. Beijing Relpow Technology Co., Ltd was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
